name: The Whole Hole Game
description:
This Game is Made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2020.1 .

The game is about traversing a puzzle maze, while avoiding a black hole that constantly getting bigger.

You have to traverse to the maze to get to the 'exit'  which is the white hole.

Once you move to a certain direction, you can only move again if you hit a block.

There are 30 levels... we were planning to add more if other people liked it enough. ^_^

Hopefully this game is enjoyable enough for you, because it's fun when we played it!
